txt.en: 'Thank you for this cool water. The musicians will be most grateful.'
'Very good, [placeholder]! The cool water of the fountain will refresh the parched throats of my kinsmen.\n\n'Take this with my thanks.'
The Fountain of the Lady
You have failed to deliver the pitcher of water

'Pick up a pitcher from the terrace here and bring it to a parched Elf, then return here for another pitcher.\n\n'There are three locations to which I would have you bring pitchers of water: parched Elves beneath Telain Neduil, at the base of the ladder that climbs up to the House of Celeborn, and at a gathering of musicians north of here.'
You have failed to deliver the pitcher of water
'The cool water of the fountain will refresh and invigorate you.'
You have failed to deliver the pitcher of water

Pitchers can be found on the terrace near Nembes, and there are three locations to which she would have you bring pitchers of water: parched Elves beneath Telain Neduil, at the base of the ladder that climbs up to the House of Celeborn, and at a gathering of musicians north of Celúrlin.\n\nNembes has asked you to deliver pitchers of cool water to parched Elves.
'Thank you for delivering the pitchers of water to my parched kinsmen.'

Pitchers can be found on the terrace near Nembes, and there are three locations to which she would have you bring pitchers of water: parched Elves beneath Telain Neduil, at the base of the ladder that climbs up to the House of Celeborn, and at a gathering of musicians north of Celúrlin.\n\nNembes has asked you to deliver pitchers of cool water to parched Elves.
'The cool water of Celúrlin is most refreshing!'

Pitchers can be found on the terrace near Nembes, and there are three locations to which she would have you bring pitchers of water: parched Elves beneath Telain Neduil, at the base of the ladder that climbs up to the House of Celeborn, and at a gathering of musicians north of Celúrlin.\n\nNembes has asked you to deliver pitchers of cool water to parched Elves.
'I must take a sip of the waters of Celúrlin again soon!'
Nembes is at Celúrlin, Galadriel's fountain in the centre of Caras Galadhon.\n\nYou have delivered pitchers of cool water to parched Elves throughout the city and should return now to Nembes.
'The waters of Celúrlin are cool and refreshing.'
Pick up a pitcher for Telain Neduil
Carry pitcher to parched Elf beneath Telain Neduil
Pick up a pitcher for the gathering of musicians
Carry pitcher to parched Elf at the gathering of musicians
Pick up a pitcher for the House of Celeborn
Carry pitcher to parched Elf beneath the House of Celeborn
'Thank you! I will distribute this water to those on the flets above.'
Talk to Nembes at Celúrlin
'This water is most appreciated. I will distribute it to the Lord and Lady.'
Nembes watches over the fountain of the Lady Galadriel.

'Mae govannen, [placeholder]. If you are willing to help me with a simple task, I would be most grateful.

'This fountain is Celúrlin, and its water is both refreshing and invigorating. I have filled pitchers with its cool water and would appreciate your help delivering the pitchers to parched Elves throughout Caras Galadhon. Just pick one up from the terrace here and bring it to a parched Elf. Then return here for another pitcher.

'There are three locations to which I would have you bring pitchers of water: parched Elves beneath Telain Neduil, at the base of the ladder that climbs up to the House of Celeborn, and at a gathering of musicians north of here.'
